alert.note: Alert for Nowata; Osage; Washington (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 6:11AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Rogers, northeastern Osage, Washington and western Nowata Counties through 700 AM CDT... At 611 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Elgin to 3 miles east of Sunset Lake to near Avant. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Bartlesville... Nowata... Dewey... Barnsdall... Copan... Ramona... Ochelata... Delaware... Avant... Lenapah... Talala... Wann... Elgin... Bigheart... Bartlesville Municipal Airport... Hulah... Sunset Lake... Osage Hills State Park... Watova... Okesa... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for northeastern Oklahoma.
